mode.name: Mode
mode.desc: Clamp or wrap the position of instance.

align.name: Align
align.desc: Align at origin or boundaries of instance. Only used for clamp or wrap mode.

horizontal.name: Horizontal
horizontal.desc: Enable if you wish this to begin at the start of the layout.

vertical.name: Vertical
vertical.desc: Enable if you wish this to begin at the start of the layout.

on-reached-any-boundary.description: Triggered when object reach any boundary.

on-reached-left-boundary.description: Triggered when object reach left boundary.

on-reached-right-boundary.description: Triggered when object reach right boundary.

on-reached-top-boundary.description: Triggered when object reach top boundary.

on-reachedbottom-boundary.description: Triggered when object reach bottom boundary.

is-reached-any-boundary.description: Return true if object reach any boundary.

set-horizontal-boundary-to-object.display-text: Set {my} horizontal boundary to [b]{0}[/b] at image point [[b]{1}[/b], [b]{2}[/b]]

pin_to0.name: Pin to
pin_to0.desc: Choose the object to pin to.

left1.name: Left
left1.desc: Name or number of image point for left boundary.

right2.name: Right
right2.desc: Name or number of image point for right boundary.

set-vertical-boundary-to-object.display-text: Set {my} vertical boundary to [b]{0}[/b] at image point [[b]{1}[/b], [b]{2}[/b]]

pin_to0.name: Pin to
pin_to0.desc: Choose the object to pin to.

top1.name: Top
top1.desc: Name or number of image point for top boundary.

bottom2.name: Bottom
bottom2.desc: Name or number of image point for bottom boundary.

set-position-x-by-percentage.display-text: Set X to [b]{0}[/b] of {my} horizontal boundaries
set-position-x-by-percentage.description: Set the object's X position by horizontal boundaries.

set-position-y-by-percentage.display-text: Set Y to [b]{0}[/b] of {my} vertical boundaries
set-position-y-by-percentage.description: Set the object's Y position by percentage of vertical boundaries.

set-position-by-percentage.display-text: Set position to ([b]{0}[/b], [b]{1}[/b]) of {my} horizontal and vertical boundaries
set-position-by-percentage.description: Set the object's position by horizontal and boundaries.

horizontal-percent.description: Get horizontal position percentage. 0 is at left boundary, 1 is at right boundary

vertical-percent.description: Get vertical position percentage. 0 is at top boundary, 1 is at bottom boundary

horizontal-scale.description: Get horizontal scaled value between left and right value

verscale.description: Get vertical scaled value between top and bottom value

horizontal-percent-to-position-x.description: Get position X by percentage of horizontal boundaries

vertical-percent-to-position-y.description: Get position X by percentage of vertical boundaries
